paragraphs: Look, we all love tossing a dryheel into the reef and taking bets on how many bites it takes before the old Maw gulps them down. But the truth is, he's getting fat. Pretty soon he's not going to be able to even catch a horker on his own and he'll be completely dependent on us. Arena thralls should be reserved for treats. It's for his own good.
And if I catch you sneaking him a snack, I'll feed you to him myself.
